articles.title: Bubba Wallace becomes first Black driver to win on Indianapolis Motor Speedway with Brickyard 400 victory - CBS News
articles.description: Bubba Wallace​ became the first Black driver to win on Indianapolis Motor Speedway's 2.5-mile oval, beating out Kyle Larson on Sunday in the Brickyard 400.
articles.content: Bubba Wallace became the first Black driver to win on Indianapolis Motor Speedway's 2.5-mile oval, surviving a late rain delay, two overtimes, concerns over running out of fuel and a hard-charging Ky… [+3004 chars]
